metadata.feature_description: View and manage activity stream specific to groups

steps.action: Navigate to Community > Groups and select Test Activity Group
steps.expected: Group page opens with Activity tab visible
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to group page at /Community/Groups/Activity/groupid/9

steps.action: View activity stream content in the group
steps.expected: Group-specific posts and activities are displayed
steps.actual: Activity stream shows multiple posts and wiki articles specific to this group

steps.action: Click on post input area and enter text 'Group Activity Stream Test Post - Created by Claude on Jan 16, 2026'
steps.expected: Text appears in the post editor
steps.actual: Text was successfully entered into the contenteditable post editor

steps.action: Click Share button to create the post
steps.expected: Post is created and appears in the activity stream
steps.actual: Post was successfully created and displayed with 'moments ago' timestamp
Filter applied successfully - only 5 text posts displayed, wiki articles hidden

steps.action: Select 'Added to Wiki' from the filter dropdown
steps.expected: Only wiki article activities are displayed
steps.actual: Filter applied successfully - only 7 wiki article entries displayed with 'authored wiki article' prefix

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Moderate group posts as group admin (Remove post)

steps.action: Locate the test post and click 'Remove' link
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with message 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' and Yes/No buttons

steps.expected: Post is removed from the activity stream
steps.actual: Post 'Group Activity Stream Test Post - Created by Claude on Jan 16, 2026' was successfully removed from the activity stream

steps.action: Verify group activity stream is accessible to group member (superuser/owner)
steps.expected: All group posts are visible to the group member
steps.actual: As group owner, all posts including those with 'Group Members' visibility are accessible and visible

observations: Group Activity Stream correctly filters activities by SocialGroupId parameter as shown in the code (ActivityStreamController.cs uses ActivityStream_ListForGroup procedure)
The filter dropdown provides 37 different activity type filters including Posts, Links, Photos, Wiki updates, Forum activities, etc.
Posts in group activity stream show same moderation options (Like, Comment, Unsubscribe, Remove, Pin/Unpin) as the main activity stream
Full non-member visibility testing would require a separate user account that is not a member of the group - current testing was performed as group owner/superuser
Code confirms that posts with SocialGroupId are restricted to the group context via the JournalListControl.SocialGroupId property
Group page shows tabs for Activity, Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Members, Wiki indicating integrated social features
